name: Lucifer's garden
description:
Simple yet relaxing game about lucifer managing his garden. No enemies, no fights, nothing is hurt.

Plant, Harvest and Sell your crops to get some money! But the City is to far and you don't wanna have to walk the distance, so, use that sweet money to build a Bridge!

Short story behind:
Lucifer got tired of crossing long canyon path between his garden and city he lives in. So he decided to build a bridge...
